Robot Controls

Use the robot controls on the left of the screen to input directions to the robot. The directions control which way the robot will walk. The time controls how long the robot will wait before executing the next action. If there is no next action the robot will keep walking in the direction of the final action. Once youve inputed all the directions you want click start! Becareful not to touch the endges of the screen or you will lose the level!

Make the Robot Touch the Rocket to beat the level!

Watch out! You'll lose if the robot touches an energy ball.

Walls are okay to touch, but they will stop the robot from moving.

Pick up the Coins for bonus points!
